definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider

sentences.english: How about we two having a few drinks tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚咱们对酌两杯如何？

sentences.english: They drank and had a very bottle of Kaoliang spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他们二人对酌，把一瓶高粱酒喝得一干二净。

sentences.english: They two drink together and finish a bottle of Grain Licker.
sentences.chinese: 他们二人对酌，把一瓶高粱酒喝得一干二净。

sentences.english: They drink wine face to face and drink a bottle of Gaoling wine out.
sentences.chinese: 他们二人对酌，把一瓶高粱酒喝得一干二净。

definition: to enjoy a cup of wine by oneself
lit. knees pressed close/intimate/seated side by side/in close contact
to talk endlessly/talking of anything under the sun
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to get thoroughly drunk (idiom)/to get plastered
